price: “O dostojanstvenici, ko će mi od vas donijeti njezin prijesto prije nego što oni dođu da mi se pokore?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَيُّكُمۡ يَأۡتِينِي بِعَرۡشِهَا قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتُونِي مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla yāayyuhā al-mala-u ayyukum yatīnī biʿarshihā qabla an yatūnī mus'limīna
